This page tries to list all the symbols that are available from the [[cpp/standard library|standard library]] in the namespace {{c|std::literals}}. The symbols are written as follows:
* Function names with {{tt|()}}.
* Templates with {{tt|&lt;&gt;}}.

▶ {{rlpt|complex_literals}} {{mark since c++14}}&lt;br&gt;

===S===
